page.title: 17 Rev Davies
page.content: Rev Davies was in the RAF for 30 years, before being called to the Ministry He went to a college for people over 40 years of age where he learnt to become a Priest He wanted to work in a Parish in the heart of some where like Manchester, but instead started as a Curate in the Parish of Duston near Northampton, before becoming the Vicar of the Church of St. Andrews in Yardley Hastings. A rural Vicar has to be able to lend his hand to most things in the church from keeping the accounts to arranging the rosta for the church flowers.The mostime consuming part of the job is the upkeep of the fabric of the church biulding. He enjoys Sundays most of all, and especially preaching to the people
